steps.sql: SELECT id FROM materials WHERE name = 'Silk';
steps.description: Retrieve the material ID for the material with the name "Silk"

steps.sql: SELECT wip_id FROM wip_material WHERE origin_material_id = '5';
steps.description: Retrieve the WIP material IDs that use the original material "Silk"

steps.sql: SELECT order_product_id FROM cutting_tasks WHERE produced_wip_id IN ('6', '8');
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs that produce the WIP materials using "Silk"
Retrieve the sewing task IDs that use the order products associated with the WIP materials using "Silk"

steps.input:
Retrieve the sewing task details for the tasks that use "Silk"
["tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 5}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 6}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 8}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 11}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 14}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 15}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 16}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 19}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 24}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 25}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 27}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 29}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 31}, Find the sewing task details", "tool_find_sewing_task, {'sewing_task_id': 32}, Find the sewing task details"]
